values: Well with this being a new year it's also a time for new changes.  I have started a new journal for close friends to read.  If you want to be added to it please comment on this entry.  I will warn you that there are a lot of changes in my life and the person you know is that the person that is writing.  New Year....New Life.

Well the Hurricane has passed.  I am still in one piece.  We got lucky again.  The outer bands are all that we got because yet again.  One of these days Sarasota is going to get hit.  When it does we will be in trouble.  But for now we survived.  The cutest was getting a phone call from my neice first checking if I still lived in Florida and then after finding out I am still in Florida, telling me that I am supposed to be in Michigan this weekend.

MICHAEL VICK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Ok, so I am a little excited.  I am going to see my first professional football game on Christmas eve.  I am also getting the joy of seeing Michael Vick play in person.  That is the best part about it.  I am so happy.  I love my friends.  They gave me the tickets for Christmas.  I LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

My buddy Cill is excited because I am taking her with me :):):):):):):)  DOn't think I will make it to church on Christmas Eve this year.  That will be strange but who knows.  I may make it back in time to relax and make it to church.

Clark Gable

But on the other hand, you soften your rough and tumble core with a disarmingly smooth exterior, and you make the ladies swoon. You're equally admired by both men and women alike, drinking other men under the table all the while charming the socks off half a dozen lovelies. You're a commanding presence, and you know how to get what - and who - you want when you want it. You're drawn to women who, like you, are savvy enough to deal with the world on their own terms. You work well with spitfires. Leading ladies include Joan Crawford, Myrna Loy, and Jean Harlow. No damsels in distress for you.

LJ Interests meme results

  1. cats:
    I am not a cat lover so I have no idea how this ended up on my interest.
  2. drum corps:
    drum corp is awesome. I love watching them.
  3. ferrets:
    The best thing to help me heal. I would have lost myself time and time again without my ferrets.
  4. friends:
    Friends are what makes this world a greater place to live.
  5. hallmark:
    Everyone needs a little pick me up. Why not send a Hallmark?
  6. hokies:
    VT baby. THanks to a couple of friends they have become a team I have started following
  7. marching bands:
    Once a band fag always a band fag.
  8. pets:
    My pets are my heart and soul. I wouldn't have made it through life without my Dog.
  9. sex:
    The word says it all....SEX!!!!!!!!!!
  10. volleyball:
    One of my favorite sports. Though softball owns my heart.

Found a house that is perfect for me.  It's small but hey I am just one person.  I love it.  I am hoping everything works out and that it will become mine.  :)  It's a perfect location for me because it's in the middle of everything that I do.  I will keep you all in formed.

Well I am still moving in Sept but I am now looking for a house to rent.  I have a friend that is a realtor that is working on a few things.  She knows someone who buys houses to rent to people with bad credit.  She is hooking me up with a guy that does this.  She has talked to him about me and he is looking for things with me in mind.  I am so happy.  If it works out I would be a home owner is 2 years.  

I started my job at Nextel.  I love it.  The people I work with tend to act like children from time to time but other then that I like it.  Tomorrow is my last day here at Protocol.  My boss Mike is predicting that I will be back by October 17th of this year.  I think I won't ever work here again but hey I am not burning any bridges because this place is always hiring so if I don't work out at Nextel I will need something.  I am hoping to last at Nextel.  What's nice is that she is looking for an assistant for the store so I am making that my goal.  I think it would come down to me and 2 other people so the odds are there.  I know one girl for sure won't get it because she cannot take pressure.

I am so happy that I am finally on a road that will lead me to great things.  Sat down and talked with some friends and learned things from their point of few and so it helped me make some needed changes.  It's good when you have friends that are true enough to speak their mind to you.  It brings back memories of friends that were in my life and different stages.  I finally have friends locally that will be honest with me.  It has taken a while and really I have only had a handful of friends that were honest to me when it came to me.  For those that may still see this I thank you for showing me what a true friendship looks like.

Changes are on the way.  I am so happy to announce that I only have 2 weeks left at this job that just sucks the life out of me.  I got the job at Nextel that I applied for.  I cannot wait.  Tomorrow is my first day and I am really just looking forward to it.  With this job I have the chance to go back to school because they have tuition reimbersment.  I cannot wait :):):)  So there are many changes coming.

Getting ready to move in August/Sept.  Getting a 2 bedroom.  I am happy about that.  Moving closer to some of my friends so I cannot wait.  other then that nothing new.

Well i was suppsoed to go up to Atlanta this weekend for pride but couldn't justify the money that would have been spent so I decided to stay home.  It was a bittersweet choice but one that was needed.  I am a little bummed because it'll be my frist pride that I haven't spent with my best friend but I am also happy because I will finally get to see my boi Jamison.  I can't wait!!!!!

Wow, it's been a while since I have done a real entry.  Not to much is new.  Got a promotion at work.  Nothing too exciting but hell I don't have to be on the phone all day anymore so that's a plus.  But I do have to deal with those that want to yell.  Oh the Joy's of being a team lead.  Thinking about starting counseling again.  It's about time I think.  A lot of people agree with me too it seems.  I am lucky to have a few friends that I can talk with and get an honest opinion from.  Not that I don't know I have more but right now I need a different point of view.  

I did a change that I have been wanting to do for a while.  I shaved my head.  It looks good and I love it so I will prolly keep it this short for a while.  Sorry to those who liked my hair but it's all gone for now :)

This will be my last public entry.  If you want access to it then comment here and I will make sure you have access.

On going thoughts through my head.  I don't know where they stop and the next one begins.  I      it.  Trying to get my head set on raising 2100 for the breast cancer walk.  It's something I need to do.  She was really my only family outside of my mom and it's something I need as closer.  I am hoping they have like an online donations and that maybe my brother in law will sponser.  Who knows.  We will see what happens.  A few of my friends are going to walk with me.  They know what it means to me so it makes me feel so good knowing they are willing to walk with me.

As you all know I lost my sister back in May. I have been slowly grieving for her and in honor of her memory I got my first tattoo. I thought I would post it here for all to see. I will write more when thoughts come to me.

What a past couple of days.  Just when you think you know what friendship is you learn you don't.  Had a great friendship forming and for the first time in forever I didn't cause it to end.  It's also the first time me being gay has bothered a friend's boyfriend.  I don't get it and I don't think I ever will.  You learn through life that boyfriends come and go but friends are forever and I am learning that line is a crock of shit.  Whoever came up with that needs to be shot.  Chances are they are already dead but if not then they need to be shot.  I am at the point where I am tired of trying to make friends.  I make a connection with one and her boyfriend does everything he can to distroy it and me.  I don't know if the distroying me was supposed to be part of it but he achieved it and it hurts.  I have never had anyone make me feel like a cheap whore.  This maybe slightly over the top but I mean come on I didn't do anything to deserve this but befriend his girlfriend.  I mean come on.  Is she not allowed to have friends outside of you?  Does her world have to revolve totally around you without thoughts of other friends?  I don't find this fair at all.  But she keeps asking me to give her time to talk to him and I am trying but it's not easy.  It's a friendship that is worth it....I know this.  I just don't know if I have the patience to do it.  I have been burned so much.

I found this is a friend of a friend's journal and the words are so close to home.........

Remember ~ Josh Groban 

Remember, I will still be here
As long as you hold me, in your memory

Remember, when your dreams have ended
Time can be transcended 
Just remember me

I am the one star that keeps burning, so brightly,
It is the last light, to fade into the rising sun

I'm with you
Whenever you tell, my story
For I am all I've done

Remember, I will still be here
As long as you hold me, in your memory
Remember me

I am the one voice in the cold wind, that whispers
And if you listen, you'll hear me call across the sky

As long as I still can reach out, and touch you
Then I will never die

Remember, I'll never leave you
If you will only
Remember me

Remember me...

Remember, I will still be here
As long as you hold me
In your memory

Remember, when your dreams have ended
Time can be transcended
I live forever 
Remember me

Remember me
Remember... me...

Rest in peace, my friend....you will never be forgotten....
Okay so I voted.  I am shocked how fast I was in and out.  No line no nothing.  The old people must have went first thing this morning.  Anyway.........Now we wait.

I wrote one of my favorite authors an email the other day and got a repsonse from her. I asked her if she could send me the poem that she wrote for her daughter Nichole who passed away. It was a poem that I saw again right around the passing of my sister and it helped me so I asked her if she could resend it to me. I wanted to post it hear to share with everyone. At the bottom of the poem is the website of the author. WELCOME HOME Angels met her in The Garden as a sign of 'Welcome Home.' They spoke graciously of love without resistance, Then sang sweetly in the gloaming that she never more need roam. She was reassured of her divine existence. She felt peace she had forgotten, and no longer did she yearn For she found herself where she was meant to be. Looking down she saw the sadness; "It was time that I return. They'd be joyous if my face they could now see." Older angels gently whispered, "Now a guardian you are." She smiled brightly as she thought of each tomorrow. She'd watch over all her loved ones from this paradise afar, Making sure they would not suffer needless sorrow. Every action has a purpose, though to us it is unclear Why this angel joined the celestial midst. Try to put aside your heartache, disappointment, and your fear, By the ancients of the ages she's been kissed. ~ Carole Giorgio (Nicole Giorgio's Mom) Carole Giorgio's Myth-Reality http:www.sedonarain.com

<font color="#800080">Sitting here listening to songs that make me think of my sister.  I have been thinking about her a lot lately.  I guess it's part of the griving process who knows.  Been thinking about going back to counseling again.  Will have to wait until my new insurnce kicks in because I finally quit my second job and that was the one that had my insurence in it.  Talked to "mom" about it.  She thinks it'll help.  This week will be interesting because my calming at work isn't going to be there for 2.5 days because she is going to Georgia to show 3 of her billdogs.  Which I think is really cool.  But it'll be a challenge because she has been there everyday since I hit the floor so she has been my sounding board.

I have been thinking about her a lot because she is unlike anyone I have met.  She is the only person to get through the walls and my safe zone.  It bothers me because I don't know how she did it.  I am glad she is there because then I don't have to act with her.  She is seeing me for me and not for any other reason.  This means a lot to me because it means that for once I have someone who knows who I am and tries to understand me.  It's weird because I think she is where she is at because she has become like a mom to me.  I have had other adopted moms before but she is unlike no other.  She is a listening ear and a sounding board.  She understands and doesn't really give advice unless asked for it.  She has put me in my place in more ways then one and I am totally thankful for her.  Yes I know I am writing a lot about her but I am so dumbfounded about it all I am still in shock.</font>

I  the fact that the family I have isn't even my blood relatives.  It used to not bother me but latly it's killing me.  THe hurricane coming made me think about things.  I called my aunt and it was like oh you live there.  I mean it's like if I physically am there they realize that I am around but ig I'm not there I don't exsist.  My favorite aunt sent me a birthday card for the first time in years.  I was a shock.

It's funny because people come into my life and they become family.  Those people are more like my family.  It's a bittersweet feeling because those that are in my life I am so grateful for but yet I'm upset because I've had to build a family to support me.  All my life I didn't want my family but when I do I realize why I didn't want them.  It's a loss cause to get upset about but it turly bothers me.  It's like no matter what I do it's not enough.  I have two cousins I have stayed in touch with but even one of them is hit and miss.

I feel alone in the world.  It's different when I am at work or the ballfield on Wendsdays because  someone is there looking out for me.  It's been an adjustment for me because unlike anyone else she's in my walls and inner shell.  It's a new feeling because she can walk up to my desk and I don't even feel that she is there.  It's an unusual situation.  One that I am slowly dealing with.  I'm not used to people coming into my comfort zone.  As most know you can get into the walls but to get into my inner shell is unheard of.  She is there.  I mean I know I am just one of the many "kids" she has but she still looks out for me more then anyone else I know.

I have no idea what to write today.  i made a goal for me to write in my journal daily.  I hand write my entries at work now because it's my only free time.  I know it's an oxymoran not busy at work but what can I say?  A lot of free time.

The downtime gives me time to think as well.  Things are improving.  Finally letting things out heloped a lot.  I am thankful for those that have been there for me these past few months.  I have learned the value of friendship from those that have shown me.  Friends are a precious matter to me.  I cherish those I have and those thathave come in and out of my life.  Each have taught something special.  The biggest lesson is to trust again.  I don't know if I will trust anyone like I trust these 2 but I now know I can trust.  Thank you C and J for showing me people can care and I can trust.

It seems like my only time to really write now a days is at work so that is what i am doing.  So if you read my journal please bare with all the babble because it helps me keep a clear head at work.

I wish I could just stop my head from swimming.  it's an ever ending cycle of thoughts and worries.  Am I alone?  Are there people that care?  I don't know anymore.  I feel so alone.  I have a few here that I know care but then there's the trust factor.  I am using Stone Cold's way of trust no one.  Well that's not totally true there is one that I trust.  It's scary that I trust her the way that I do.  I think it's because she is very motherly to me.  It's what I have needed recently.  Someone to just check up on me from time to time.  It's been very helpful this past week because the dam of emoitions are breaking.  She has helped me keep the over flow in check.  I don't think I can truly express how much she has helped me.  In case you actually do read this......Thank You!!!!!!

I think I am slowly coming to terms with the loss of my sister.  I can't say that I'll ever let go totally but I know I can't keep it locked up like I am.  I just need to ralize that thought she is gome she's still with me.  I'm blessed when it comes to guardians because I have two of the best.  I know that with my sister and grandfather watching over me I will be okay.

I am playing ball four nights a week.  It's weird because though I love playing I hate showing up.  It's not fun for me at times.  i think a lot of that stems from my moods.  Some from the teams I play for.  I don't know but either way I am hoping to find joy either way.  I made a promise to one team that I intend to keep.  You know who you are.  I made that promise to you because it's part of that trust thing you have.  Igive you a lot more lee way that I do anyone else and part of me is nervous about that and part of me is glad.

I don't know what to say because I just spent like 2 hours clearing my head in a letter.  One that I don't know if it will be read or not nor do I care because it was to help clear my head and help figure out what is wrong.  the only conclusion that I came to is that I am not happy.  Go figure.  Who could believe that.  Ms unhappy is still unhaoppy.  Been thinking bout my sister a lot.  She was my hero and mentor and I still cannot believe she is gone.  She went out teaching me one life lesson....Never let them see you hurt.  Through it all my sister stayed strong.  Cracking jokes and just being Chris.  I don't know if she ever knew how much I truly did admire her but I can say she was my hero and the only one that I will ever look up to like I did.  This isn't a long entry but hey no one reads it anyway so it's ok.

Life is an unless rollar coaster.  I am still dealing with the loss of my sister and start crying at the silliest things.  My stress level is unmanagable.  I am the only one really working.  It's no fault of Christina's.  She is in market research and her bosses aren't scheduling her.  It sucks.  I am still working 2 jobs.  It is getting to much.  I have no time for me.  Yes I am playing ball but that isn't really enough because all I do is come home exhausted.  I feel like I am close to breaking but yet I can't stop because right now ball is my only out.

Talked with my mommy today.  Turns out that she has a boyfriend.  I know nothing about this man but he passed my Aunt Jan's test so he must be okay.  My aunt is offically my mother's guardian.  They are now in the process of getting my aunt something else too.  I have no idea what it is but my mom is happy so that's all that matters.

PARENTAL
ADVISORY
ALONEATHEART CONTAINS
EXPLICIT LYRICS

Well it's the day after the funeral and I am still here.  This week has been the hardest of my life.  I am not feeling much.  I haven't really accepted it.  I know she is gone and not forgotten but I refuse to accept the reality that I will never talk with her again.  This wasn't the way I planned life.  My sister and I were suppsoed to bury my mother together and the grow old watching her kids grow up, graduate, and get married.  But now it's just me watching them grow up.  So many choices to make.  Do I move back to Michigan to help with the kids or do I stay in Florida.  B made a good point that both she and I are away and it gives the kids somewhere to go in the summer's when they get older.  So I am thinking that I will stay in Florida.  I haven't really accepted it so those that know me will prolly worry for a while.  I don't know how to let go.  I never thought that I would go through life without a sister.  Well I am going to wrap this up because I have been staring at this screen all afternoon.

I am posying here because I need to. My sister is gone.  SHe passed away early this morning.  It's hard.  I am going back to Michigan(hopefully) for the funeral and then this weekend is my cousins wedding so I maybe staying with that.  It's an emoitional struggle because she was my hero.  One I looked up to for so many reasons.  I don't think i can even begin to express what this woman was.  She was a mother and sister to me at one point.  We weren't always close but since the birth of my neice we have been closer.5 min convos turned into 45 these past few years.  Sbe was always my strength whenever I needed her she was there.  I don't know what I will do.  SHe was basically omy only family.  Yes, my mother is still alive but that is all I have left.  My mom was suppsoed to go becfore my sister not the other way around.  I hate this.  I hate it all.  I want my sister back.

I always told people I was a bitch but they never believed me.

Sorry if this turns into a long post but I am posting from the library so I have no clients to do the LJ cuts.


Seems like life never slows down.  My sister and brother in law will be coming down in June(I hope) and I will get to spend 2 days with them before they head on their cruise.  Well one with the whole family and one day with just my niece and nephew.  It should be fun.  Hannah always brings the little kid back in me.

Been thinking a lot about my family and what to do.  I feel so useless when it comes to my sister because she is in Michigan and I am here but I feel like she would be disappointed if I moved back to Michigan just because she was sick.  She knows my life(what there is of it) is down here but yet I feel so helpless because I can't help her in anyway.  It was great because they were planning this vacation but then it got moved up and Brian took over the planning so everything has gotten changed so it's like that little planning is gone too.  I want to help I just don't know how to anymore.

Friends are hard to come by now a days.  I am learning that complete strangers are more willing to help you out when you need it then my friends are.  But then again this maybe why I don't have many real friends.  Does that make life boring????? a little but less hurt.  I wish people could just be real and true to themselves.  Makes life easier for everyone.

I hate working 2 jobs.  Seems like that isn't even enough but in all honesty I have no choice.  With C not working again right now it's the only income coming in.  People think the solution is find a job that makes more money but the issue is the job market.  There really isn't anything out there right now.  I would love a "normal" job but it's not there and with me working so much when do I have the time to interview?  I am it's not like I can quit one job just to free up my days on an off chance that I will get an interview.  That just isn't realistic.

Well it's been forever since I have written in my journal so I figured I would write.....See E I am not just staring at the screen.  Not sure what I will write but I figured I would just write and let the fingers go.  It's been forever since I have done a real post but it's hard with no access.  Life has been a teacher os patience.  I know that seems like a duh thought but I never learn anything the easy way. 
Friends have come and gone in my life and most of those I haven't batted an eye at but there are a few that really touched my life.  Lately, I have been learning the value of a true friendship.  Those that I thought were true aren't and it bothers me.  I mean it's no wonder Christians get a bad rep.  The girl acts like my friend but then it's I need to go my bibical duty as a friend and tell you that being gay is wrong.  Now, don't get me wrong being gay was something that I have struggled with for a while.  I spent many hours in prayer just praying that God would make me straight and that I wasn't really gay but through those hours of prayer I got a peace over me that it is okay to be gay and that was the way that God made me.  It's people own problem if they don't believe you.  It's your job to do what God has planned in your life.  It's what I am finally doing.  I am finally happy with who I am.  If you don't believe that I have made the peace then it's your problem not mine.  I am just sorry that I lost a friendship over all this but this is how is has to be.  I may not have that many friends left but those that I have I cherish.

It's weird that some friendships fail and that others florish.  It's a strange feeling.  Not really used to it.  It's taught me that people are placed in my life for a reason.  There are a lot that have a special place in my heart and I miss greatly but if it's meant to be then the friendships come back.  If they aren't then I take what I have learned and florish from that and the lessons I was taught when they in my life.

year ago today. Directions: Repost your journal entry from a year ago today (or closest day). Been trying to figure out who I am. I don't know anymore. I mean I look at who I am through other people and realize I am not consistant. This isn't right but I don't know where to start to fix it. I am just like I have always been. I thought I changed but I haven't. I look deep down and see who I should be and who I want to become but then the fear takes over and I hide behind the person I am now. Not healthy I know, but how do I change it? I don't know.

My life is like this lately and I hate it.  I have given up on everyting that I believe in.  I am learning that friendships are highly overrated and that giving a dhit about people just gets your burned?  I am at the point where I am not even going to bother anymore.  I am going to become a cold heartless bitch.  Not like it matters because I cannot keep friendships anyway.  I have learned that one through experience.

How do I deal with the unknown?  Though it's not really the unknown.  It's more like some sick waiting game.  Why does it have to be my sister who's cancer can't be beaten.  Why is it that we will be lucky to habe her around long enough to see Colin graduate from Pre-school.  Yes, that's only 3 years away but the doctor's aren't sounding to optimistically on that.  Why don't I have the ability to look into the furture and know how much of my neice's life she will see.  I always hoped that she would beat the cancer but right now the cancer is beating us.  Why does it have to be this way.  Where is the miracle?  We need one now.  She is too young to have to worry about this.  She should be able to watch all 3 of her kids grow up.
